nodes.text: Travecao Govan was a female Human Jedi of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, she was part of Satele Shan's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite Yavin Coalition along with forces of the reconstituted Sith Empire under Sith Lord Darth Marr.

Travecao Govan appears as a Jedi Knight gear vendor in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014. She was later removed during a gear system restructuring.
